comment.author: 52810288@N05
comment._content: This is actually the XP5Y-1. The first prototype, made as a patrol aircraft, prior to the R3Y transport. Notice the unarmed gun turrets and different engine exhaust. It is actually shorter than the R3Y. I wish this was a higher resolution scan.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
